code: /* eslint-disable import/no-anonymous-default-export */export default function(param){var ctx=param.ctx,height=param.height,width=param.width,bars=param.bars,barColor=param.barColor;return function(arr){ctx.clearRect(0,0,width,height);if(Array.isArray(barColor)){var line=ctx.createLinearGradient(0,0,0,height);var len=barColor.length;barColor.forEach(function(color,i){line.addColorStop(i/(len-1),color);});ctx.fillStyle=line;}else{ctx.fillStyle=barColor;}var rectWidth=width/bars;var barWidth=rectWidth*0.5;var capHeight=Math.min(barWidth,10);for(var i=0;i<bars;i++){var rectHeight=arr[i]/256*height;var capDistance=arr[i]>0?Math.min(rectHeight+40,height-capHeight):0;ctx.fillRect(rectWidth*i,height-rectHeight,barWidth,rectHeight);ctx.fillRect(rectWidth*i,height-(capDistance+capHeight),barWidth,capHeight);}};}
